prodNameC: 宙斯黴漿菌免疫球蛋白M酵素連結免疫吸收分析法檢測系統 (未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc:
1.	Plate. inactivated preparation of M. pneumoniae strain FN.
2.	Conjugate. Conjugated (horseradish peroxidase) goat anti-human IgM (μchain specific).
3.	Positive Control (Human Serum).
4.	Calibrator (Human Serum).
5.	Negative Control (Human Serum).
6.	Sample diluent. Tween-20, bovine serum albumin, phosphate-buffered-saline, and goat anti-human IgG (γ-chain specific), (pH 7.2 ± 0.2).
7.	TMB: 3,3’,5,5’-tetramethylbenzidine (TMB).
8.	Stop solution: 1M H2SO4 0.7M HCl.
9.	Wash buffer concentrate (10X): 10X concentrated phosphate-buffered-saline and Tween-20 solution.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 偵測人體血清中Mycoplasma pneumoniae的IgM Ab.

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3375 黴漿菌屬血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 200 EVANS WAY BRANCHBURG, NEW JERSEY 08876, U.S.A.
